name: Scrape-O-Matic Data Gatherers
description: A set of diverse components that gather data from websites

options.label: Skip Simulating Mouse Movement
options.description: Normally the scraper moves the mouse around a bit after loading the page to simulate an actual user

options.label: Skip Waiting After Page Load
options.description: Normally the scraper waits 10 seconds between loading the page and running the primary data gathering

options.label: CloudFlare
options.description: Detects the CloudFlare bot detector and waits for it

options.label: Forbidden
options.description: Detects if the server replied with a 403 forbidden page

options.label: Cookie Banner
options.description: Detects cookie banners using heuristics and word corpus.

options.label: CMP name
options.description: Tries to identify the name of the CMP using regex patterns in HTML attributes.

options.label: IAB CMP info
options.description: Gathers CMP info by pinging the IAB TCF API.

options.label: User Options
options.description: Find user options such as accept, reject, settings based on a large pre-processed word-corpus

options.label: Toggles
options.description: Finds checkboxes and their default status

options.label: DOM
options.description: Stores a copy of the DOM.

options.label: Cookies placed
options.description: Reports any cookies set on the page after load.

options.label: Elements with event listeners
options.description: Finds all clickable elements based on event listeners.

options.label: Button elements
options.description: Finds all elements that might be buttons using HTML heuristics.

options.label: Visibility Analyzer
options.description: Enhance Cookie Banner and Button gatherers output with visual information.

options.label: Click Listener Analyzer
options.description: Enhance Cookie Banner and Button gatherer output with number of click listeners.
